channel.title: Music – Poco
channel.description: Recent content in Poco on Music

item.title: Poco - Sea Of Heartbreak
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Paul Hampton, Hal David
KY: 2414 / KY: 7139

The lights
in the harbour
don’t shine for me
I’m like a lost ship
lost on the sea
the sea of heartbreak
lost of loneliness
mem’ries of your caress
so devine
I wish you were mine
again my dear
I’m on a sea of tears
sea of
heartbreak -

No how did I lose you
where did I fall
why did you leave me
always to sail
the sea of heartbreak
lost of loneliness
mem’ries of your caress
so devine
I wish you were mine
again my dear
I’m on a sea of tears
sea of heartbreak -

of what I’d give
to sail back to shore
back to your arms
once more so come
to my rescue
come here to me
Take me and keep me
away from the sea
sea of heartbreak
lost of loneliness
mem’ries of your caress
so devine
I wish you were mine
again my dear
I’m on a sea of tears
sea of heartbreak
the sea of heartbreak
I’m dealin’ in a
sea of
heartbreak -
